mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLNT(CLNT_CD, CLNT_NM, SALES_NM, SALES_TEL, TPL_NM, TPL_TEL, TPL_EMAIL, BUSINESS, EVENT, BUSI_NUM, OWNER_NM, OWNER_TEL, BUSI_ADDR, REG_DT, REG_NM) VALUES(#{clntCd}, #{clntNm}, #{salesNm}, #{salesTel}, #{tplNm}, #{tplTel}, #{tplEmail}, #{business}, #{event}, #{busiNum}, #{ownerNm}, #{ownerTel}, #{busiAddr}, SYSDATE, #{regNm})
mapper.update: UPDATE CLNT SET SALES_NM = #{salesNm}, SALES_TEL = #{salesTel}, TPL_NM = #{tplNm}, TPL_TEL = #{tplTel}, TPL_EMAIL = #{tplEmail}, BUSINESS = #{business}, EVENT = #{event}, BUSI_NUM = #{busiNum}, OWNER_NM = #{ownerNm}, OWNER_TEL = #{ownerTel}, BUSI_aDDR = #{busiAddr}, MOD_DT = SYSDATE, MOD_NM = #{modNm} WHERE CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
UPDATE CLNT SET DEL_YN = 'Y', MOD_NM = #{modNm}, MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CLNT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CLNT_CD
SELECT * FROM CLNT WHERE CLNT_NM LIKE '%'||#{clntNm}||'%' AND DEL_YN='N'
